widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.description: Justia Elevate: We finally launched our new Justia Elevate service! Even more good news: our first Justia Elevate sign-up happened on March 30th, 2022. This is a notable achievement for Justia, indeed.

Justia Ask A Lawyer Analysis: Our team generated a complete data report on Justia Ask A Lawyer's activity and insights that will provide helpful information to guide the company to move in the right direction to achieve our goals.
Justia Amplify Ads: We launched Justia's "Got PPC?" marketing campaign via banners on our different web properties and through an email campaign.
State Codes: We published eleven new state code versions for New Jersey, Delaware, and D.C. (2021) and the 2019 version of the U.S. Codes.

Oyez Development: We enhanced our development process for Oyez.org by dockerizing the backend application. This advancement will allow our development team to handle ongoing application improvements better.
WordPress Upgrades: We keep maintaining our WordPress installations up to date. The latest upgrade occurred for our LawBlogger and BlawgCloud client installations.
